body:
Following #19318, 
We are building "analysis" versions of packages for profiling/tracing purposes. BUT we would like to keep the clean/untouched version installed as well.
Is there any way to keep two copies of the same spec? Could I mark one spec as "analysis" and choose to load one or the other? 
`spack load wrf`
or 
`spack load wrf-analysis`

Thanks,
title: Install two copies of same spec?
